message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1400000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I understand your position, but $1200000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $1300000 to meet you halfway.  This still allows me to make a reasonable profit and hopefully, we can finalize this deal.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above your proposed price. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'll counter with $1250000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
